rows.label: qst200905_msg002
rows.name: Do you need something with Otto?

rows.label: qst200905_msg003
rows.name:
The windmill at Tuuli
Bakery has broken down...

rows.label: qst200905_msg004
rows.name:
I was asked to call Otto-san
to come and repair it.

rows.label: qst200905_msg006
rows.name:
The owner, Ahato-san, is famous
in town not just for his bread but
also for his exquisite sweets.

rows.label: qst200905_msg007
rows.name: I often go there to buy things.

rows.label: qst200905_msg010
rows.name:
Actually, Otto went to cut
wood and hasn't returned.

rows.label: qst200905_msg011
rows.name: He usually comes back the next day...

rows.label: qst200905_msg013
rows.name:
We'll go look for Otto-san. Can
you tell us where he went?

rows.label: qst200905_msg014
rows.name: Otto headed to the Nocclia Timber Site.

rows.label: qst200905_msg019
rows.name:
But something might have
happened on the way...

rows.label: qst200905_msg020
rows.name:
Could you head to the Nocclia
Timber Site from Torigo, looking
for Otto along the way?

rows.label: qst200905_msg021
rows.name:
I think you'll be fine, but
just in case, be careful.

rows.label: qst200905_msg023
rows.name: Now, let's go search for Otto-san!
